Controller - Class in src.controller
The Controller class is responsible for: - Processing the request from the client for each service
- Invoke the appropriate service
- Marshal service responses with the help of Marshaller
- Invoke Server method to send the response back to the client
Controller() - Constructor for class Controller

Marshaller - Class in src.marshaller
Class to marshal and unmarshal the client's request
This includes the request ID, service ID, file path and payload
Marshalling is done by type

Server - Class in src
Server
The server will receive requests from the client and process them accordingly
The server will then send a response back to the client
Server() - Constructor for class Server
 
Server.TimeoutFrequency - Enum Class in src
Enum to specify the timeout frequency
Service1 - Class in src.services
Service 1
This service will read a file from the server and send it to the client
The client will specify the file path, offset and number of bytes to read
The server will read the file and send the requested bytes to the client
Service1(String) - Constructor for class Service1
Constructor for Service 1 to read the entire file
Service1(String, int, int) - Constructor for class Service1
Constructor for Service 1
Service2 - Class in src.services
Service 2
This service will insert bytes into a file at a specified offset
The client will specify the file path, offset and the bytes to insert
The server will insert the bytes into the file at the specified offset
Service2(String, int, byte[]) - Constructor for class Service2
Constructor for Service 2
Service3 - Class in src.services
Service 3
This service will monitor a file for changes and notify the client when the file has been modified
The client will specify the file path and the server will monitor the file for changes
When the file has been modified, the server will notify the client
Service3() - Constructor for class Service3
 
Service3.Service3Record - Class in src.services
Class to store the details of a subscriber (client)
Service3Record(int, Date, String) - Constructor for class Service3.Service3Record
Constructor for Service3Record
Service4 - Class in src.services
Service 4
This service will return the size of a file
The client will specify the file path and the server will return the size of the file
Service4(String) - Constructor for class Service4
Constructor for Service 4
Service5 - Class in src.services
Service 5
This service will delete from a file
The client will specify the file path, offset and number of bytes and the server will delete from the file
The server will delete the bytes from the file at the specified offset
Service5(String) - Constructor for class Service5
Constructor for Service 5
Service5(String, int, int) - Constructor for class Service5
Constructor for Service 5

unmarhsalService0(int, byte[]) - Static method in class Marshaller
Unmarshal the input for Service 0
Format:
- 4 bytes for request ID
- 4 bytes for service ID
- 4 bytes for length of file path
- variable length for file path

Unmarshal the input into a ClientPacket object

unmarshalRequestID(byte[]) - Static method in class Marshaller
Obtain the request ID by left-shifting the first 4 bytes of the input

Unmarshal the input for Service 1
Format:
- 4 bytes for request ID
- 4 bytes for service ID
- 4 bytes for length of file path
- variable length for file path
- 4 bytes for offset
- 4 bytes for number of bytes to read

Unmarshal the input for Service 2
Format:
- 4 bytes for request ID
- 4 bytes for service ID
- 4 bytes for length of file path
- variable length for file path
- 4 bytes for offset
- 4 bytes for length of bytes to insert
- variable length for bytes to insert
unmarshalService3(int, byte[]) - Static method in class Marshaller
Unmarshal the input for Service 3
Format:
- 4 bytes for request ID
- 4 bytes for service ID
- 4 bytes for length of file path
- variable length for file path
- 8 bytes for expiry date in long (time since epoch in milliseconds)

Unmarshal the input for Service 4
Format:
- 4 bytes for request ID
- 4 bytes for service ID
- 4 bytes for length of file path
- variable length for file path

- 4 bytes for request ID
- 4 bytes for service ID
- 4 bytes for length of file path
- variable length for file path
- 4 bytes for offset
- 4 bytes for length of bytes to delete
unmarshalServiceID(byte[]) - Static method in class Marshaller
